name: tm14
effect: Teaches Blizzard to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Blizzard to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user flies up into the sky and then strikes its target on the next turn.
